data.name: Parasight: Chlorophyll worms
data.detailed_description:
Paraisght Prologue

Parasight Prologue is the first chapter of the full game.
In the prologue, you will find out about the game's story, gameplay, combat system, etc...
You can choose between 6 classes and shape up the attribute of your protagonist and start your adventure!
In the game, you have an inventory, and you can equip a lot of various weapons, armours, rings, and many more!

Story

Maximilie goes to the jungle to play with her friend. She was playing with his friend peacefully. When she was on her way to return to her house, she saw a strange plant that she had never seen before. Maximilie wants to find out what it is, but suddenly...!!!
If you want to know the rest of the story, Download the prologue and play it now!

Features:



  • You can choose to play peacefully or aggressively!
  • Choose between 6 classes of Knight, Mage, and some more!
  • Dynamic story.
  • Rich story & richer side stories!
  • Cool puzzles and mini-games!
  • Many cute NPCs.
  • Original Art and soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Proccessors
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anyrhing
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anyrhing
